label: tiled text
tip: A text which can be used as the base text for metatextual layers. Its content is chopped in rows and arbitrarily defined tiles. Each row contains a set of tiles and an open set of metadata. Each tile contains text and an open set of metadata.

label: editing metadata
tip: Editing tile's or row's metadata: while a tile's text is edited in-place, its metadata are edited in this UI. Metadata are just a set of key/value pairs. You can filter and edit them at will.
